presentation.description: Perform security tests on your &aMinecraft servers&f&l!

menu.message5: &f&lTo view the list of commands use the command &ahelp&f&l.
menu.message6: &f&lIf you want to join our discord server, use the command &adiscord&f&l.
menu.message7: &f&lYou can also visit the page of MCPTool: &bwww.mcptool.net

discord.message1: Log in to my Discord server.
discord.message2: Get help or report a bug about the program.
discord.message3: Stay up to date with my projects.
discord.message4: You can also talk to me through the server.
